database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: Couzens_Hippo_P86_VS5_VS6
entry.description: This submission is part of the mass spectrometry datasets for the manuscript by Couzens et al. This submission contains files for an okadaic acid time course (association of proteins to the MOB1A bait in a phosphorylation dependent manner) and a comparison of the interactions mediated by phosphatase inhibition for the following baits: MOB1A, MOB1B and MOB4 in comparison to a negative control. See the README file within "Methods and Protocols" and the accompanying File description.
